channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Hegseth says six people killed in two new US attacks on alleged drug boats
item.description: US defense secretary says without providing evidence that dead from strikes in eastern Pacific were ‘narco-terrorists’ US forces struck two more alleg...

item.title: Farage says small business owners who thought Brexit would cut regulation have been betrayed – UK politics live
item.description: Reform UK leader claims that burden of regulation is worse than before the referendum Farage said the problems facing small businesses were not a fail...

item.title: Trump pardons Giuliani and allies accused of trying to subvert 2020 election – latest updates
item.description: Directive could prevent future administrations from prosecuting more than 70 people named Donald Trump is in Washington today. At 11am ET, he’ll welco...

item.title: Andrew Miller is bookies’ favourite to win 2025 Booker prize
item.description: The Land in Winter has shortest odds of victory, ahead of Kiran Desai’s The Loneliness of Sonia and Sunny Andrew Miller is the bookmakers’ favourite t...

item.title: Cop30 live: crucial climate talks begin in Brazil as hosts insist summit must lead to ‘implementation’
item.description: Ministers and high-ranking officials from nearly 200 countries have gathered in the Amazonian city of Belem, with Brazil insisting this will be “the C...

item.title: Teenager detained for boy's New Year's Eve murder
item.description: Areece Lloyd-Hall is detained for killing Harry Pitman, 16, at Primrose Hill on 31 December 2023.

item.title: Former French president Sarkozy to be freed from prison after three weeks
item.description: The former French president was jailed in October for conspiring to fund his election campaign with money from late Libyan dictator Muammar Gaddafi.

item.title: Thompson's 'audacious' opener features in WSL's best goals
item.description: Alyssa Thompson's first league goal and Eveliina Summanen's stunning free-kick feature in the best goals from this weekend's Women's Super League.

item.title: IOC moves closer to ban on transgender women
item.description: The International Olympic Committee moves a step closer to introducing a blanket ban on transgender women from female categories across all sports.

item.title: BBC chairman's letter to the Culture, Media and Sport Committee in full
item.description: Samir Shah has apologised for an "error of judgement" over the editing of a speech by Donald Trump in a BBC Panorama documentary.
